^Jessie;you know I had to look into it

^Jessie;These people were in limbo, months and months later
^Jessie;People who in some cases have just been in England their entire lives. This is their *home*
^Jessie;So I started asking a few people if racism is common
^Jessie;There was a thing called the Brixton riots back in the 80s. Really rough stuff. Apparently started from or by racist police
^Jessie;now there's still invasive stop and searches. Profiling. Proportion of black people in prison is way higher than any other demographic
^Jessie;grime musicians and events are targeted for harrassment
